value_claims.claim_title: Cost savings from AI-driven operational analytics
value_claims.claim_description: Panasonic Energy expects the Palantir partnership to quickly generate cost savings through AI and machine learning-enabled facility data management, replacing manual processes.
value_claims.source_quote: PENA expects the partnership to quickly generate cost savings and reduce manufacturing waste.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Cost savings explicitly attributed to Palantir's AI and ML capabilities for facility data management, directly replacing manual processes.

value_claims.claim_title: Manufacturing waste reduction through AI analytics
value_claims.claim_description: Panasonic Energy expects to reduce manufacturing waste at its EV battery facilities through Palantir's AI-driven operational analytics and smart factory integration.
value_claims.source_quote: PENA expects the partnership to quickly generate cost savings and reduce manufacturing waste.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Waste reduction directly linked to Palantir's AI and ML system for facility data management and automated operational analytics.

value_claims.claim_title: Improved data accuracy through automated systems
value_claims.claim_description: AI automation addresses challenges of disparate data systems and manual work-arounds that previously led to inaccurate data analysis at Panasonic Energy facilities.
value_claims.source_quote: We engaged Palantir to assist on our journey towards a connected factory by addressing the challenges of disparate data systems and manual [work-arounds] leading to inaccurate data analysis
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Palantir's AI system directly addresses data accuracy issues by replacing manual processes and integrating disparate data systems.

context_claims.claim_description: Palantir Foundry system deployment at both Sparks, Nevada and De Soto, Kansas facilities beginning in 2025.
context_claims.source_quote: Now, both the main factory and PENA's new facility in De Soto, Kansas, will be run on Palantir's Foundry product starting in 2025.

context_claims.claim_description: Palantir Technologies formed a multi-year partnership with Panasonic Energy of North America for smart factory implementation.
context_claims.source_quote: Palantir Technologies is forming a multi-year partnership with Panasonic Energy of North America to add smart tech sensors and AI-driven operational analytics

context_claims.claim_description: Panasonic Energy manufactures and supplies lithium ion-cells to Tesla Motors at Gigafactory 1 in Sparks, Nevada.
context_claims.source_quote: The facility, known as Gigafactory 1, is notable for manufacturing and supplying lithium ion-cells to Tesla Motors.

context_claims.claim_description: Implementation spans two facilities: Gigafactory 1 in Sparks, Nevada and a new facility in De Soto, Kansas.
context_claims.source_quote: Now, both the main factory and PENA's new facility in De Soto, Kansas, will be run on Palantir's Foundry product starting in 2025.

context_claims.claim_description: Strategic initiative to transform into a connected factory by addressing disparate data systems and manual processes.
context_claims.source_quote: We engaged Palantir to assist on our journey towards a connected factory by addressing the challenges of disparate data systems and manual [work-arounds]

context_claims.claim_description: AI implementation focused on manufacturing operations including edge sensors, automated systems, and operational data provision to factory floor workers.
context_claims.source_quote: The smart factory agreement includes integrating edge sensors across factory lines, introducing AI to automate systems and providing operational data to workers on the facility's floor.

context_claims.claim_description: Implementation of Palantir's Foundry product for AI and machine learning-driven facility data management and operational analytics.
context_claims.source_quote: Palantir says its Foundry system will enable PENA to use artificial intelligence and machine learning to better understand and manage its facilities data

context_claims.claim_description: New De Soto, Kansas facility targeting annual production capacity of 32 GWh for automotive lithium-ion batteries.
context_claims.source_quote: Panasonic Energy Begins Mass Production at New Automotive Lithium-ion Battery Factory in Kansas, Aiming for Annual Capacity of 32 GWh
